name: @rocket-sensei/activeadmin_trumbowyg
description: Trumbowyg WYSIWYG editor integration for ActiveAdmin 4

scripts.postinstall: echo 'Remember to copy Trumbowyg icons: npm run copy:trumbowyg-icons'
scripts.copy:trumbowyg-icons: mkdir -p app/assets/builds && cp node_modules/trumbowyg/dist/ui/icons.svg app/assets/builds/icons.svg 2>/dev/null || echo 'Please ensure trumbowyg is installed'

author: Mattia Roccoberton <mat@blocknot.es> (Original), Gleb Tv <glebtv@gmail.com> (ActiveAdmin 4 port)
